main.name: Amrutha Adiyath
main.description: As a seasoned JavaScript Developer, I bring {{EXPERIENCE}} years of experience to the table. At the age of {{AGE}}, I hold a senior position in my field, specializing in JavaScript programming.
main.bio: Greetings! I am Amrutha Adiyath, currently residing in the vibrant city of Moose Jaw, Canada. At the age of {{AGE}}, I have amassed {{EXPERIENCE}} years of comprehensive experience in JavaScript programming, mastering both front-end and backend technologies such as AngularJS, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL. As an artist by hobby, I have a particular fondness for front-end development, where I can blend my technical skills with my creative flair. My love for animals has led me to rescue and foster cats, and I take pride in my ability to handle even the most challenging felines. In my downtime, you will find me experimenting in the kitchen, engrossed in a thrilling movie, or unwinding to the tunes of rock music!
main.contactmessage: If you have something interesting to discuss, I'd love to hear. Please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: The following are my current skills and my expertise

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Technology management
education.description: Through this program, I have honed my skills in Java-based project development and software architecture, using SQL server as a back-end database. I have also gained a thorough knowledge of network management principles and protocols. Moreover, this program has sharpened my business communication abilities, such as conflict resolution and negotiation skills.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
education.description: During my academic journey, I delved deep into the intricacies of data structures and algorithms. My self-motivated learning approach led me to explore modern technologies such as HTML and JavaScript. This newfound knowledge sparked my interest in web development, prompting me to create a variety of websites. These projects, ranging from course-related to personal endeavors, served as practical applications of my theoretical understanding.

work.title: Store Associate(part-time)
work.description: As a customer service specialist, I assist customers in finding the right products for their needs, answering their questions, and providing them with relevant information. I strive to build lasting relationships with customers and enhance their experience. I also handle phone and online orders, ensuring they are processed and fulfilled efficiently. Additionally, I manage inbound calls and resolve customer issues in the first interaction.

work.title: Senior JavaScript Developer
work.description: My journey began as a front-end developer, specializing in AngularJS. Later, Iâ€™ve transitioned to backend development, utilizing NodeJS in conjunction with PostgreSQL.

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: Learned about various front-end development technologies, Learned to convert wire-frames to web pages

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
